commit.message:
[multiple changes]

2012-08-06  Vincent Pucci  <pucci@adacore.com>

	* s-atopri.adb: Minor reformatting.

2012-08-06  Arnaud Charlet  <charlet@adacore.com>

	* gnat-style.texi: Clarify that all subprograms should be
	documented. Minor rewording.

From-SVN: r190160
